DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether BL-8040 safe , tolerable effective mobilization Hematopoietic Stem Cells ( HSC ) healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study Evaluating Safety , Tolerability , PK PD BL-8040 Stem Cell Mobilization Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject BMI 18 30 kg/m2 Weight â‰¥ 60 Kg Subjects must either surgically sterilize ( vasectomy ) , partner childbearing potential , must use two method contraception , one must barrier method , first dose 3 month last dose Subject able willing comply requirement protocol History clinically significant disease Any illness within 4 week prior screen examination Any history alcohol and/or drug abuse addiction and/or active / past ( 2 year screen ) nicotine consumption Clinically relevant deviation normal physical examination vital sign screen baseline Clinically relevant laboratory abnormality identify screen baseline Positive test screen HIV I & II , hepatitis B and/or hepatitis C part positive test Syphilis , HTLV I & II Nucleic Acid Test ( NAT ) HIV HBV Positive test urine drug abuse anamnesis ( Barbiturates , Benzodiazepines , Amphetamines , Opiates , Cocaine , Cannabinoids , Methadone , Phencyclidine , Tricyclic Antidepressants ) and/or positive alcohol blood test Subjects lose donated excess 400 mL blood within 3 month prior Day 1 study
